Module sabi
Package sabi

Class Proc<D>

java.lang.Object
sabi.Proc<D>
Type Parameters:
D - A type of dax used for external data accesses.
public class Proc<D> extends Object
Proc is a class which represents a procedure.

  • Constructor Details

    • Proc

      public Proc(D dax)
      A constructor which takes a dax as an argument. The class of the specified dax is needed to inherit DaxBase class.
      Parameters:
      dax - A dax object.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - - If the dax is not null and does not inherit DaxBase class.

  • Method Details

    • addLocalDaxSrc

      public void addLocalDaxSrc(String name, DaxSrc ds)
      Registers a local DaxSrc with a specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name for the argument DaxSrc and also for a DaxConn created by the argument DaxSrc. This name is used to get a DaxConn with DaxBase.getDaxConn(java.lang.String) method.
      ds - A DaxSrc object to be registered locally to enable to be used in only specific transactions.

    • runTxn

      @SafeVarargs public final void runTxn(Logic<D>... logics) throws Err
      Runs logic specified as arguments in a transaction.
      Parameters:
      logics - Logic functional interfaces.
      Throws:
      Err - If an exception occurs in a logic.

    • txn

      @SafeVarargs public final Runner txn(Logic<D>... logics)
      Creates a transaction having specified logics.
      Parameters:
      logics - Logic objects.
      Returns:
      A Runner object which processes a transaction.
